item.description:
The training is being offered by MassWildlife. Call (508) 389-6300 for more information or visit MassWildlife Website at http://www.mass.gov/d...

July 17 & 18 -- Lost in the Woods, With Your Walking Stick, Plymouth -- If you are a woman who would like to learn more about being safe while hiking, camping, hunting or fishing, join the "Becoming an Outdoors-Woman" group at Myles Standish State Park, where BOW's expert survival instructors Karen Nottonson and Bob Trapnell will teach you the basics of what to do when lost in the woods -- and much more in the way of woodsman's skills. Anyone who spends a lot of time outdoors can become turned around, separated from a group, or lost and if this happens late in the day it can become an uncomfortable and very frightening situation. But if you are prepared, and know what to do, you can actually enjoy the experience while helping searchers find you.

This workshop is designed for women 18 and older. Register here: http://www.mass.gov/d...

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Women's Backwoods Survival Training Weekend in MSSF
